com.lucaslouca.commands

Class LLRailRoadServiceCommandFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lucaslouca.commands.LLRailRoadServiceCommandFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LLCommandFactory

    public class LLRailRoadServiceCommandFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements LLCommandFactory
    This class implements the LLCommandFactory Interface. It provides methods for creating concrete command implementations of the abstract type LLAbstractRailRoadServiceCommand. LLAbstractRailRoadServiceCommand are commands that implement the LLCommand Interface but are specifically implemented for the LLRailRoadService.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LLRailRoadServiceCommandFactory(LLRailRoadService service)
      Create a new LLRailRoadServiceCommandFactory that sets the given LLRailRoadService as a receiver for the commands.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LLAbstractRailRoadServiceCommand createCommand(java.lang.String input)
      Create and return a new LLAbstractRailRoadServiceCommand based on the input.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LLRailRoadServiceCommandFactory

        public LLRailRoadServiceCommandFactory(LLRailRoadService service)
        Create a new LLRailRoadServiceCommandFactory that sets the given LLRailRoadService as a receiver for the commands.
        Parameters:
        service - LLRailRoadService that will be set as the receiver in the commands that this factory will create.

    • Method Detail

      • createCommand

        public LLAbstractRailRoadServiceCommand createCommand(java.lang.String input)
        Create and return a new LLAbstractRailRoadServiceCommand based on the input.

        Input has the following form:

        commandName;town1;town2;...townN for distance calculation

        or

        commandName;town1;town2 for shortest path

        or

        commandName;town1;town2;N for countRoutesWithXXX() functions

        Specified by:
        createCommand in interface LLCommandFactory
        Parameters:
        input - the input to parse.
        Returns:
        an {code LLAbstractRailRoadServiceCommand} that implements the LLCommand interface.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if no such command available.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if input format is invalid.
